text: wadhkr -ayha alrswl- nby allah hwdana 'akha ead fi alnnasb la fi aldyn, hin 'andhar qawmah 'an yahila bihim eiqab allh, wahum fi manazilihim almaerufat b "alahqaf", wahi alrmal alkathirat janub aljazirat alerbyt, waqad madat alrusul b'indhar qawmaha qabl hud wbedh: bi'ana la tushrikuu mae allah shyyana fi eibadatikum lh, 'iiniy 'akhaf ealaykum eadhab allah fi yawm yaezum hwlh, wahu yawm alqyamt
